id: scenario-value-scanner-middle-aged-scenarios-family-family communication facilitated across generations and geography
title: Family communication facilitated across generations and geography
description: Family communication facilitated across generations and geography
content:
Scenario: Family communication facilitated across generations and geography
    Given family members are distributed across states
    And communication about care needs is essential but complex
    And family discussions about care can be emotionally difficult
    When family_elohim supports family communication
    Then it should provide structured communication tools
    And facilitate difficult conversations about elder care, finances, and support
    And ensure all relevant family members have voice
    And help family navigate emotional complexity of care discussions
    And support family in making collaborative decisions
    And prevent communication breakdowns that harm care coordination
    And maintain family cohesion amid care demands
